005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
012
013import java.util.stream.Stream;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016
017/**
018 * A common interface for all key specifier implementations.
019 */
020public interface IKeySpecifier {
021
022  /**
023   * Perform a lookup on the provided target item.
024   *
025   * @param targetItem
026   *          the item to query
027   * @param dynamicContext
028   *          the dynamic context to use for expression evaluation
029   * @param focus
030   *          the focus item for expression evaluation
031   * @return a stream of collection values matching this key specifier
032   */
033  Stream<? extends ICollectionValue> lookup(
034      @NonNull IItem targetItem,
035      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
036      @NonNull ISequence<?> focus);
037}
